typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Student and teacher cannot be the same"

arguments.value: Student and teacher cannot be the same

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Student and teacher cannot be the same"

documentation.text: Anyone who call this function will be a Tutor. Tutor creates the course, wich includes number of lessons, total cost, address of student and a time lock

Only a student can access this
 Student approves that contract, the total cost of the course is deducted from student wallet and stored on the contract

Only a tutor can access this
 The tutor calls for the start of an individual lesson. The tutor cannot sign this if the student didn't sign attendance

documentation.text:
Only a tutor can access this
 Tutor can withdraw one lesson at a time, or multiple lessons given at once

Only a student can access this
 If a time lock for unfulfillment is set, after that period of time, the student can recover all of his remaining assets

documentation.text:
Only a tutor can access this
 Tutor can withdraw one lesson at a time, or multiple lessons given at once

Only a student can access this
 If a time lock for unfulfillment is set, after that period of time, the student can recover all of his remaining assets

papaApprove(uint256).notice: Only a student can access this Student approves that contract, the total cost of the course is deducted from student wallet and stored on the contract

papaAttendLesson(uint256).notice: Only a student can access this   The student is giving attendance, making possible a partial withdrawn for the teacher

papaCreate(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Anyone who call this function will be a Tutor. Tutor creates the course, wich includes number of lessons, total cost, address of student and a time lock

papaInitLesson(uint256).notice: Only a tutor can access this The tutor calls for the start of an individual lesson. The tutor cannot sign this if the student didn't sign attendance

papaRecover(uint256).notice: Only a student can access this If a time lock for unfulfillment is set, after that period of time, the student can recover all of his remaining assets

papaWithdraw(uint256).notice: Only a tutor can access this Tutor can withdraw one lesson at a time, or multiple lessons given at once
